article_title: New Roche Chairman Plans No Big Changes
article_text:
Christoph Franz, the new chairman of Roche Holding AG, said the Swiss pharmaceutical giant needs to continue focusing on innovation but he plans no major changes as he takes the helm of the company.

Mr. Franz, who has served as a nonexecutive director on the company's board since 2011, was overwhelmingly elected as chairman by shareholders at the company's annual meeting in Basel on Tuesday.

Mr. Franz, who was elected for a...
